short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go beyond 140 characters by converting your tweets into images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Go beyond 140 characters by converting your tweets into images directly in Twitter!

• The text scales as you type, so it always fits in a convenient image size.
• The centralisation button lets your stylise your tweet.
• Quickly copy all @mentions, links and hashtags to your clipboard to include from the image into your tweet. 
• The resulting images are small and optimal for mobile and desktop browsing.
